title: Chapter 1154 - A Decree From The Powerful Factions Of The Stars Beyond
volume_title: Sword In Hand, He Stands Above The Wilds, Sovereign Throughout The Ages
body:
Chapter 1154 - A Decree From The Powerful Factions Of The Stars Beyond

Ancestor Peng approached, clasped his fist, smiled, and exchanged pleasantries with Wen Lingxue, Cha Jin, and the others.

Jing Xing chimed in from the sidelines, smiling and introducing Ancestor Peng and his companions.

The oldest expert of the Nine Extremes Profound Capital!

The Pure One honored by all of the Wilds’ Daoist sects!

When they realized that this unassuming old man had such a status, Wen Lingxue and the others were dumbstruck, and they hurried to their feet to greet him.

“These are just some random trinkets, but please do me a favor and accept them, my young friends.” In the end, Ancestor Peng took out several treasures, which he passed to Su Yi's guests. All of them flowed with colorful light and extraordinary spirituality. Every last one of them was a rare treasure.

Su Yi’s friends were instantly flattered, but also a bit alarmed. However, just as they were about to refuse, Su Yi laughed. “Take them. To that old fart, those things really are just some random trinkets.”

These seriously aren’t precious!?

Wen Lingxue and the others couldn’t even find words to express their feelings.

Immediately after, the Border Mountain Yao Ancesetor, the Skythorn Poison Emperor,...
original_title: Chapter 1154 - A Decree From the Powerful Factions of the Stars Beyond
